name: Stupid Movie
reviewBody:
Yes i know the first part was a dream, but this movie makes absolutely no sense, i found it to be completely stupid.

Only good thing i can say about this flick, is that it had a nice lesbian scene, and i did like the movie audition scene. other than that, couldn't stand the movie, to many questions left unanswered, questions that i didn't care to find the answers for.

If you like movies that make you think, then you may like this one, tho i think the director made it so there are any number of possible answers to the questions you will ask yourself if you make it thru this movie without falling to sleep
